title: The 3T Extrema Gravel Bike Aims to Be Bikepacking Ready
content:
3T pioneered aero frames off road, but this latest model goes bikepacking with dedicated mounts and even bigger tire clearance, without moving away from their aero origins.

Read the full article at The 3T Extrema Gravel Bike Aims to Be Bikepacking Ready on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
